text: Ta palanaharale tyasala'i saharsa svikara garyae ra tyasala'i ramri hera caha pradana garyo ra jakariyala'i usako heracaha garnevala banayo. Jakariya (alai.) Jatikhera pani usako kothabhitra janthe, pasama khana pa'umdathe. Unale mariyamasamga sodhne gardathe ki mariyama! Yo khana timro pasama kahambata a'umcha? Uni bhanthina ki allahakahambata a'umcha. Nihsandeha jasala'i allaha cahancha prasasta roji (jivika) pradana gardacha
